For instance , 12-month prevalence rate estimate U.S. 9.5 % Europe 8.5 % population . In Colombia , 12-month prevalence 6.2 % 12.1 % . The Colombian National Mental Health Survey estimate point prevalence mild moderate depressive symptom 15.6 % severe depressive symptom 4.2 % adult . About 50 % population access health service , majority population mental health problem adequate mental health insurance coverage .
